alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Grafton; Strafford; Sullivan; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:26AM EST until December 26 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, sleet accumulations of around 1/4 of an inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light wintry mix will develop early Saturday morning across the advisory area, with freezing rain causing icy roads and slippery travel conditions. The precipitation will likely mix with and change to snow Saturday night, with snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
